__e: Thanks to people like you, you don't need a partner.

I'm only here tonight because of you.

It's all you, you know. The reason I'm back here.
Thanks to you, There won't be any more.

We saved everyone's life and they'll never know it.

I know it was because of you.
'They can all think for themselves, which they've me to thank for.
